dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 71.5 x 46 cm (28 1/8 x 18 1/8 in.)
Repeat H x W: 44.5 x 45.7 cm (17 1/2 x 18 in.)
title: Chintz
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants (2 reds, purple and black) applied by brush and pen. Madder dyed. Blue apparently brushed over a crackled resist (chintz).
description: Fantastic scrolling shapes with elaborate floral bouquets.
name: Chintz
